DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine whether hydrocodone acetaminophen exposures follow oral dose Vycavert comparable follow oral dose Norco .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Bioequivalence Vycavert ( 10 mg Hydrocodone Bitartrate/325 mg Acetaminophen ) Compared Reference Drug Norco
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant disease History obstructive sleep apnea Life time history and/or recent evidence alcohol and/or drug abuse
